name: electron-typescript-preact-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate for an Electron app written in Typescript/JSX

scripts.clean: npm run prebuild && node build/scripts.js clean
scripts.generate-api: npm run prebuild && node build/scripts.js generate-api
scripts.watch-api: npm run prebuild && node build/scripts.js watch-api
scripts.build-dev: npm run prebuild && node build/scripts.js build-dev
scripts.start-dev: npm run prebuild && node build/scripts.js start-dev
scripts.build-prod: npm run prebuild && node build/scripts.js build-prod

author: Yoctopuce Sarl
